Text:
Been tryin to get a hold of this for a while now, thanx, much appreciated. Also woud you be so kind as to tell me how to convert this album to an mp3 format, or atleast point me in the right direction? 
thanx again swedge
what the hell are WV files...why not just upload it with FLAC or straight up wavs.
i tried to type in wmv and it would not open, only prompting quicktime. so sad. i have been trying to download this album for months!

tY! - great up

appreciate the .wv's - much better than .mp3's or .ogg.

.wv is a wavepack file, which is lossless, like FLAC. download foobar2000 to play or convert them to FLAC.

I am constantly amazed at the ignorant, lazy, critical plebs lurking on the internet. As mikeycorleone - an educated, intelligent sort of fellow has mentioned - it's in a WavePack format. Download the most excellent XRecode (pc only methinks) and convert to any darn format of your particular, high fussy inclination. 320kbps, 2 channel stereo in my case. Sounds fantastic. Thanks to the upper. Superb release. One of the albums of the year.
Thanks for the up.  And for the quality.  Some albums demand to be in as lossless a format as possible.  This is definitely one of them.

@dafuzion
Thanks for the suggestion of Xrecode.
